short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Practice Japanese vocab every time you open a new tab!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Learn Japanese vocabulary using nihongoTab, a chrome new tab extension designed to help you master words from the Japanese Language Proficiency Test (JLPT) levels N5 to N1. Whether you're just starting out or aiming for fluency, this extension helps you learn Japanese through randomized repetition, focusing on 10 words at a time. We present a small, manageable set of words for you to review and memorize to make learning approachable and lead to steady improvement in your vocabulary.

On new tab open, you’ll see a single vocab kanji. By clicking on the kanji you can see the hiragana reading. By clicking on the blank lower half you can see the English meaning of the word.

Let’s learn Japanese together with nihongoTab!
